About me

Friends! I am glad to welcome you to my broadcast. My name is Laya and I adore dancing, singing, painting, keep a good mood and please you with myself. I like to drink coffee in the morning, sometimes with a cigarette, and watch the sunrise. I love looking at the rain, it pacifies. I recently got acquainted with eSports and I want to develop in this, I play the game League of legends, mainly as a support and sometimes AD carry. I also like to watch anime, my favorites are "Naruto" and "Death Note". If you can recommend other animes to me, I will be glad to watch them and discuss them with you in the future. In my free time I watch TV shows and films, and my favorite books are "Dracula" and "A Clockwork Orange". Since childhood I have been listening to rock music, and with age my musical taste does not change, but only expands, now I listen to almost everything that my ears will like, so we can also listen to your music if you want to show me something new. As I wrote above, I love to sing and used to be a vocalist in a rock band, but, unfortunately, they did not agree on a creative understanding of each other. Favorite band Marilyn Manson, I have been listening to him since I was 12 and dream of getting to his concert. She grew up on bands such as Metallica, Manowar, Iron Maiden, Rammstein. My parents instilled in me a musical taste, I love them very much for the fact that they gave me a gorgeous musical taste. I also recently fell in love with Argentine tango and Astor Piazzolla, I consider him one of the great composers in this genre. Now I'm working on a music project in the style of progressive house and my friend and I founded the duo "Red Quarter", my friend is a DJ, and I write the lyrics and record the vocals. My dream is to perform at the "Tomorrow land" festival in the future. If my work is interesting, I will be very grateful. I also write poetry from time to time. I welcome any fetishes, I want you to be happy, but I don't like dirty talk in a public chat when they insult me ‚Äã‚Äãand my users. I don't make exceptions either. Everything that happens on my broadcast remains in my broadcast. Let's respect each other. I hope that we will exchange positive emotions and delight each other with communication and not only.
